Content direction change: remove prior/placeholder text and use only the user-supplied DREAMONOMY copy for Homepage + sections (Services, Why Choose Us, Our Philosophy optional, Founder message).
Scope clarification: do not rebuild from scratch; keep the existing created site/design and only add/replace the site copy with the user-provided DREAMONOMY text.

Homepage content order requirement: Services section should come 2nd, Message from the Founder 3rd, and Why Choose Us 4th (at the end).

existing_features.title: Implement a colourful, vibrant, modern, informative marketing website inspired by the design quality/clarity/visual appeal of cuemath.com, with a child-friendly but professional look that feels trustworthy for parents (bright but balanced colours, rounded shapes, friendly typography, generous spacing, clean uncluttered layout).
Create a 4-page site structure with top navigation links to: Home, About / Why Choose Us, Services, Contact. Navigation must be sticky on scroll and include a mobile hamburger menu.

Build the Home / Introduction page as the first-impression page with section-based scrolling (no internal tabs). Include a bold hero section featuring a centered circular cut-out element designed to hold a circular logo. The circular element must rotate smoothly (slow, elegant) and pause rotation on hover. Include playful bright gradients/background shapes and placeholder call-to-action buttons. Use CSS animations where possible and keep motion subtle/professional.

Build a combined About Us + Why Choose Us page with a cohesive layout that alternates text and visuals across sections. Use placeholder icons/illustrations and copy that is warm, reassuring, and intelligent, highlighting trust, philosophy, and differentiation.

Build a Services page with a grid/card-based layout where each service is displayed as a visual card using placeholder icons, soft shadows, rounded corners, and hover effects. Structure the layout and code so services can be easily expanded later (e.g., data-driven rendering from an in-code list).

Build a Contact page with a simple, clean, friendly layout including: an HTML contact form configured to be Netlify-forms ready (if possible), placeholder contact information, and a clear friendly CTA (e.g., “Get in Touch” or “Start a Conversation”).
Ensure the site is responsive for desktop, tablet, and mobile, uses smooth (non-excessive) animations, and uses relative paths for all static assets. Use placeholder images and placeholder text only.
Do not implement or require backend functionality; the site must function as a static build with no server dependencies.

Increase the size of the rotating circular hero element on the Home page so it visually occupies roughly half of the hero section/page height on desktop, while remaining responsive and not causing content overflow on tablet/mobile.

Update the Home page rotating circular hero/logo element to use the uploaded image file ("Blue and White Vintage School Logo.png") and ensure the square PNG is perfectly centered inside the circular area with a true circular mask (no visible square corners), no overflow, and no unintended cropping across desktop/tablet/mobile breakpoints.

Increase the size of the Home page rotating circular hero/logo element so that on desktop it visually occupies clearly more than half of the hero section height (i.e., >50%), while remaining responsive on tablet/mobile and not causing layout overflow or clipping.

Replace the current multi-color gradient hero/section backgrounds with a simpler, cleaner background treatment across all pages (Home, About/Why Choose Us, Services, Contact), keeping the design child-friendly but less visually busy.

Add subtle, scattered decorative background elements derived from the user-provided logo image ("/assets/Blue and White Vintage School Logo.png") and place them sparingly throughout page sections (not just the Home hero).

Update the Home page hero background to remove the existing blob overlay image (currently "/assets/generated/blob-shapes-set.dim_1600x900.png") and use the new logo-derived decorative elements instead, while keeping the rotating circular logo hero element unchanged.

Implement the new education-themed background layer using static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated and apply it consistently to the sections that currently use decorative accents (including hero sections that currently use the "hero-bg-simple" treatment).

Remove all existing placeholder/previous marketing copy and branding across the entire frontend and replace it with the user-uploaded DREAMONOMY content only (including replacing any remaining “LearnHub” naming).

Update the Home page (frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx) to use only the uploaded HOMEPAGE text for the hero/intro content, including DREAMONOMY positioning (K–12, lifelong learning, psychology-driven teaching, real-world disciplines, responsible AI).

Update the About/Why Choose Us page (frontend/src/pages/AboutWhyPage.tsx) so it contains only the uploaded “TAB 3: WHY CHOOSE US”, “TAB 4: OUR PHILOSOPHY”, and “TAB 5: MESSAGE FROM THE FOUNDER” content, removing the current placeholder “Our Story/Philosophy/Why Choose LearnHub?” text.

Update the Contact page (frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx) to remove placeholder contact details (email/phone/address/hours) that are not part of the uploaded content, while keeping the Netlify-ready contact form functional.
